title: My screen has been glitchy (doesn't respond to touch) after it got a bit wet.
content: Hi, my pixel 4a got a bit wet on the counter and it originally had "liquid detected on USB port" message.  I dried it off, laid it flat for 2 hours and turned it off.  I turned it back on, the message was gone, but the screen glitches every time I try to swipe the screen.  Any ideas on how to fix this?
